722984f-b.title: Manhattan: Rivington Street - Ludlow Street
722984f-b.text:
(1)
Rivington Street, north side, west from Ludlow Street, showing
a station of the Aecend Ave. Elevated Line on Allen Street.
May 26, 1937.
P. L. Sperr.
(2)
A similar view from a point slightly westward (No. 94).
March 26, 1937.
P. L. Sperr.
Na, 6 71S
(3)
An occupant of one of the stores in No. 94. Careful cbservtion
iof No. 1, will clearly show the suspended strings of dried mushrooms.
March 26, 1937.
P. L. Sperr.
722984f-b.folder: Rivington Street & Ludlow Street, Manhattan, NY
